title: Open Interest (ОІ)
content:
This indicator shows the total number of open short and long positions for the contract held by all market participants for this instrument.

Note: The open interest is broadcast online only in the Russian market, and only for futures. American stock exchanges cannot configure it on a real time basis because not all of them submit OI data online.

Some stock exchanges do not submit OI at all. Crypto exchanges Binance and ByBit provide OI approximately once per minute(only for Futures)

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.
